headline.main: RED FLEET STRIKES; 5 Ships Reported Sunk Include Nazi Cruiser and Destroyer ARMY ALSO IS ATTACKING Enemy Pushed Back in Center and North -- Leningrad Sea Defenses Are Bombed RED FLEET STRIKES AGAINST GERMANS

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Monday, Sept. 29 -- In both the central and Leningrad sectors the Red Army has started fierce new counter-attacks and captured German advance positions, the Russians reported last night.
abstract: USSR forces in fierce counter-attacks, Leningrad and Central Fronts; USSR Fleet strikes at Germans in Baltic, Arctic and Black Sea; German cruiser, destroyers and 2 transports sunk; Odessa defenses hold; more towns retaken, Central Front; Crimean defense holding; illus
snippet: MOSCOW, Monday, Sept. 29 -- In both the central and Leningrad sectors the Red Army has started fierce new counter-attacks and captured German advance positions, the Russians reported last night....

byline.original: By CYRUS L. SULZBERGERWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
